long_description: Warm, comfortable and easy on the wallet, the Kelty Discovery Sleeping Bag will help you sleep soundly under the stars on spring, summer and fall camping trips. Cloudloft(TM) synthetic insulation is high lofting for warmth and is easily compressed over and over for storage; provides warmth down to about 30degF. Full-length draft tube along the zipper seals out cold air while dual locking zippers allow for easy venting on warmer nights. Oversize dimensions keep you from feeling restricted to ensure a better night's sleep. When camping with that special someone, simply zip 2 Discovery bags together to create a double-wide bag. Pad attachment points keep your bag centered on your sleeping pad for comfort. Kelty Discovery Sleeping Bag includes a stuff sack that makes transportation and storage easy.
short_description: Warm, comfortable and easy on the wallet, the Kelty Discovery Sleeping Bag will help you sleep soundly under the stars on spring, summer and fall camping trips.
